question.title: Will Donald Trump Jr. be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
question.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if Donald Trump Jr. is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. All other candidates will resolve as **No**. This question is not restricted to the candidates currently mentioned; other options may be added in the future.

For this question, it is not relevant who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election; it is solely determined by who is selected by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

Q.title: Will Donald Trump Jr. win the Republican nomination if he runs against a strong challenger in the primaries?
Q.body: This question will resolve as Yes if Donald Trump Jr. is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election, despite facing a strong challenger in the primaries. If he fails to secure the nomination due to a strong challenger, this question will resolve as No.

P_given_Q.title: Given that Donald Trump Jr. runs against a strong challenger in the primaries, will he be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
P_given_Q.body: Suppose the following is true: Donald Trump Jr. will win the Republican nomination if he runs against a strong challenger in the primaries. This question will resolve as Yes if Donald Trump Jr. is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election, despite facing a strong challenger in the primaries. If he fails to secure the nomination due to a strong challenger, this question will resolve as No. The outcome is solely determined by who is selected by the delegates of the Republican National Convention.

If he secures the nomination despite a strong challenger, this question resolves as No.

Q.title: Will Donald Trump Jr. run for a different political office before 2024?
Q.body: This question will resolve as Yes if Donald Trump Jr. officially announces and campaigns for a different political office before the end of 2023. If he does not announce or campaigns for another political office, this question will resolve as No.
